arts.sum: It was disappointing on Thursday night (at AZ) and when that happens, you want to go out there and respond, but we just needed to slow things down a little bit. Bournemouth are a good pressing team, so they ask you those questions, but you know, I was pleased that the boys persevered.”

arts.ttl: 'Desire and intent' - Rooney full of praise for Bournemouth's front three
arts.sum: Wayne Rooney analyses the performance of Bournemouth's forwards during a 2-2 draw against Tottenham Hotspur.

"I said before, I can't dictate to people how they interact, but AZ’s crowd certainly helped them on Thursday night and we need our crowd to get behind the boys on Thursday to make it an atmosphere where maybe we lose some of that nervousness and anxiety within our game. The idea was only to play 45 today, but he was keen to stay on for a bit longer and you could see he grew into the game and was really important for us."

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou calls on Tottenham fans to help his side ease their nerves in Europe League clash with AZ Alkmaar
arts.sum: Ange Postecoglou urged Tottenham's supporters to help his team soothe their nerves as they try to salvage their season against AZ Alkmaar in the Europa League.

arts.ttl: Iraola: Bournemouth can't match clinical 'big boys'
arts.sum: Bournemouth manager Andoni Iraola said his side must be more clinical if they want to fight with the "big boys."

arts.ttl: Exclusive: Tottenham Face Bundesliga Competition in Race for £50m Star
arts.sum: Southampton winger Tyler Dibling is now emerging as an option for Bundesliga side Bayer Leverkusen, alongside Tottenham.

arts.ttl: Ranieri: ‘Roma season changed with Tottenham, now for the final straight’
arts.sum: Claudio Ranieri tells Roma he is ‘not a young man’ and cannot be made to...

arts.ttl: 'We showed a real mentality' - light at end of tunnel for Tottenham?
arts.sum: Manager Ange Postecoglou hails Tottenham's spirit after his side come from behind to draw with Bournemouth.

arts.ttl: Spurs recover from two-goal deficit to draw with AFC Bournemouth
arts.sum: Bournemouth miss the chance to go sixth in the Premier League and instead only climb one place to eighth, above Newcastle United on goal difference. Spurs, though, gave themselves a lifeline two minutes later when Sarr’s attempted cross looped over Kepa, and that would not be the Bournemouth goalkeeper's last involvement.

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou makes 'chaotic' admission after Tottenham rally to claim Bournemouth draw
arts.sum: Tottenham looked on the verge of another defeat after going 2-0 down to Bournemouth on Sunday before a fight back saw them salvage a draw, and boss Ange Postecoglou has admitted it was a 'chaotic' game
